scripts.start: npm run start:ui & npm run start:editor
scripts.start:editor: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run start
scripts.start:ui: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/ui -- npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:editor
scripts.build:editor: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run build
scripts.build:ui: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/ui -- npm run build
scripts.docs:dev: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/doc -- npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/doc -- npm run build
